ring_world_1.zhcn_desc: 这个设施将作为集结地、资源仓库，并为成千上万的环形世界建设者提供居住区。
ring_world_1.en_desc: This complex will serve as a staging ground, resource depot and living quarters for the hundreds of thousands of personnel involved in the Ring World's construction.
ring_world_1.ai_weight_logic:
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 10

ring_world_1.possible_desc:
▲拥有§Y恒星基地§!
△£不能在帝国边境外建造。
▲不能在未调查的星系里建造。
△£不能在有宜居星球的恒星系中建造。
△£不能在黑洞周围建造环形世界。
△£无法在双星星系或三星星系中建造。
△£已存在巨构建筑，无法建造。

№行星满足要求：
№
△£必须建造在一颗恒星周围。
△£不能在有未研究异常现象的行星上建造。
△£无法在缺乏天体作为原材料的恒星系建造。
ring_world_1.megastructure_details: 一个§Y环形世界§!容纳了数个行星大小的区块，但需要拆除星系中其他的行星天体作为材料。
ring_world_1.construction_info_delayed: 一个完整的环形世界包含了４个修建完成的环形世界区段，每一段都相当于一个巨大的盖亚星球。

ring_world_2_intermediate.zhcn_desc: 这个初期的框架结构环绕着星系内的恒星，并会作为我们最后建设完整宜居带的平台。
ring_world_2_intermediate.en_desc: This initial skeletal frame encircles the system's sun, and serves as the platform on which we will eventually build fully habitable sections.

ring_world_2.zhcn_desc: 这个框架结构大体上构成了未完成的环形世界的总表面区域的四分之一。其中较小型的宜居区块的建设工作还没有完成。
ring_world_2.en_desc: This skeletal frame section makes up roughly one quarter of the unfinished Ring World's total surface area. Work on the smaller habitable section has not yet been completed.

ring_world_3_intermediate.zhcn_name: 已完成的环形世界区段
ring_world_3_intermediate.zhcn_desc: 一个功能完整的环形世界区段、包含了一个可供居住的活跃生态圈。
ring_world_3_intermediate.en_desc: A fully functional habitable Ring World section, complete with an active biosphere, that is ready for settlement.

ring_world_ruined.zhcn_desc: 这个环形世界区段曾容纳过一个功能齐全的居住地，但现在已经废弃。在理论它修复还可以被修复，但这需要更先进的科技和大量的资源。
ring_world_ruined.en_desc: This section of the Ring World once supported a functional biosphere, but no longer. Repairs are theoretically feasible, but it would require advanced technology and a large amount of resources.

ring_world_restored.zhcn_name: 已完成的环形世界区段
ring_world_restored.zhcn_desc: 一个功能完整的环形世界区段、包含了一个可供居住的活跃生态圈。
ring_world_restored.en_desc: A fully functional habitable Ring World section, complete with an active biosphere, that is ready for settlement.

dyson_sphere_0.zhcn_desc: 此施工场地可用作未来建造戴森球的基址。
dyson_sphere_0.en_desc: The construction site station serves as the base for the future construction of a Dyson Sphere.

№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 15

△£不能在帝国边境外建造。
△£戴森球只能建造一个。
▲不能在未调查的星系里建造。
△£不能在有宜居星球的恒星系中建造。
△£不能在黑洞，中子星或者脉冲星周围建造戴森球。
△£无法在双星星系或三星星系中建造。
△£已存在巨构建筑，无法建造。

△£因已存在轨道空间站阻碍，无法建造。

▲来自

dyson_sphere_0.megastructure_details: 一个 §Y戴森球§!完全的包裹住一个特定的恒星，直接将恒星辐射输出转化为£energy£ 能量币。
dyson_sphere_0.construction_info_delayed: 戴森球将会覆盖住整个恒星，使得星系内所有行星全部变成贫瘠星球或冰封星球。

dyson_sphere_1.zhcn_desc: 这个是未来戴森球的框架基础，还不会生产任何能量。
dyson_sphere_1.en_desc: The frame is the foundation for the future Dyson Sphere, and does not generate any energy.

dyson_sphere_2.zhcn_desc: 部分运作中的戴森球——能量生产效率§Y25%§!。
dyson_sphere_2.en_desc: A partially operational Dyson Sphere - §Y25%§! energy generation efficiency.

dyson_sphere_3.zhcn_desc: 部分运作中的戴森球——能量生产效率§Y50%§!。
dyson_sphere_3.en_desc: A partially operational Dyson Sphere - §Y50%§! energy generation efficiency.

dyson_sphere_4.zhcn_desc: 部分运作中的戴森球——能量生产效率§Y75%§!。
dyson_sphere_4.en_desc: A partially operational Dyson Sphere - §Y75%§! energy generation efficiency.

dyson_sphere_5.zhcn_desc: 完全运作中的戴森球——能量生产效率§G100%§!。
dyson_sphere_5.en_desc: A fully operational Dyson Sphere - §G100%§! energy generation efficiency.

▲来自

▲§H剧毒星球§!

▲星球类型是§H荒芜星球§!
№星球类型更换为§H荒芜星球§!

dyson_sphere_ruined.zhcn_desc: 一个废弃的戴森球。尽管它已经年久失修，但这个庞然大物的基本结构大部分完好无损。通过必要的科技和大量的资源投入，我们就有可能修复好这个戴森球。
dyson_sphere_ruined.en_desc: A ruined Dyson Sphere. Despite its age, the megastructure's basic frame is largely intact. With the necessary technology and vast amounts of resources, the sphere could potentially be repaired.

dyson_sphere_restored.zhcn_desc: 完全运作中的戴森球——能量生产效率§G100%§!。
dyson_sphere_restored.en_desc: A fully operational Dyson Sphere - §G100%§! energy generation efficiency.

spy_orb_0.en_desc: The construction station serves as the base for the future assembly of a Sentry Array.

spy_orb_0.megastructure_details: 随着工程阶段的不断推进， §Y哨兵阵列§!会逐步的扩展传感器范围，最终将囊括整个银河。
spy_orb_0.construction_info_delayed: 随着工程阶段的不断推进，哨兵阵列会逐步的扩展传感器范围，最终将囊括整个银河。

spy_orb_1.zhcn_desc: 一个配有专职天文学家和战术分析师的最先进的监听哨站。
spy_orb_1.en_desc: A state-of-the-art listening post crewed by a permanent staff of astronomers and tactical analysts.

spy_orb_2.zhcn_desc: 沿中央尖顶安装的振荡鳍能将微弱的信号从无处不在的背景辐射中分辨出来。
spy_orb_2.en_desc: Oscillating fins arranged along a central spire isolate faint signals from ever-pervasive background radiation.

spy_orb_3.zhcn_desc: 巨大的静态天线将覆盖范围提升到了史无前例的范围。
spy_orb_3.en_desc: Massive, static antennas provide an unprecedented boost to raw coverage.

spy_orb_4.zhcn_desc: 完整的哨兵阵列能够将探测范围延伸至整个银河。
spy_orb_4.en_desc: A complete Sentry Array extends sensor range to cover the entire galaxy.

spy_orb_ruined.zhcn_desc: 这个破碎的残骸曾是一个无比强大的哨兵阵列。尽管已经老化，它的主体大部分都保持完好。运用适当的科技和大量的资源，我们就有可能让它重新工作。
spy_orb_ruined.en_desc: The shattered remnants of what was once an extremely powerful Sentry Array. Despite its age, the megastructure's antennas are, for the most part, structurally intact. With the right technology and a large amount of resources, the array could potentially be restored to working order.

spy_orb_restored.zhcn_desc: 完整的哨兵阵列能够将探测范围延伸至整个银河。
spy_orb_restored.en_desc: A complete Sentry Array extends sensor range to cover the entire galaxy.

№id：utopia.2015

think_tank_0.en_desc: This initial site will serve as the base for the future construction of a Science Nexus.

▲§H极端唯物主义§!
think_tank_0.possible_desc:
▲拥有§Y恒星基地§!
△£不能在帝国边境外建造。
△£已存在巨构建筑，无法建造。
▲不能在未调查的星系里建造。
△£科学枢纽只能建造一个。

№行星满足要求：
№
△£不能在未调查星球的或者宜居星球上建造。

think_tank_0.megastructure_details: §Y科学枢纽§!的研究实验室和数据库能够产出源源不断的原生数据流。

think_tank_1.zhcn_desc: 中央核心配备有最先进的奇点电站，能够满足科学枢纽的所有能量需求。日后它也将与新建的研究设施相连通。
think_tank_1.en_desc: Equipped with a state of the art singularity reactor, the central core will cover most of the Nexus' energy needs. It will also connect the future research facilities.

think_tank_2.zhcn_desc: 科学枢纽研发辅翼包含绝大部分的实验室并为科学家们提供住所。分支配备了多个安保区域，在必要时可以完成对不同区域的封锁。
think_tank_2.en_desc: The research wings will contain most of the labs and provide housing for the scientists. They come with multiple security chambers to allow for complete lockdown of various areas, if necessary.

think_tank_3.zhcn_desc: 一个设备齐全且随时可以投入使用的科学枢纽。
think_tank_3.en_desc: A fully equipped and operational Science Nexus.

think_tank_4.zhcn_desc: 以它的创造者的名字命名，这个科学枢纽的驱动核心结合着一个装有我们最优秀的科研人员的大脑的神经库，这使得它能够加速运转。
think_tank_4.en_desc: Named after its inventor, this Science Nexus has a neural bank containing the brain of one of our finest researchers integrated into its main drive, allowing it to operate at an increased speed.

think_tank_ruined.zhcn_desc: 一个废弃的科学枢纽。尽管它的内部已经被掠夺者抢夺一空，但这个庞然大物的主体大部分都保持完好。运用适当的科技并投入大量资源，我们应该能够让它重新工作。
think_tank_ruined.en_desc: A ruined Science Nexus. Although its insides were stripped clean by looters eons ago, the megastructure's main hull is still mostly intact. With the right technology and a lot of resources, it could potentially be refurbished.

think_tank_restored.zhcn_desc: 一个设备齐全且随时可以投入使用的科学枢纽。
think_tank_restored.en_desc: A fully equipped and operational Science Nexus.
think_tank_restored.on_build_complete_logic:
№星系内所有环境物体
№摧毁环境物体§H§!

gateway_0.en_desc: The initial site will serve as the base for the construction of a future Gateway.

gateway_0.megastructure_details: 一个允许舰船通过亚空间瞬间移动到其他星门的传送门。

gateway_final.zhcn_desc: 一条穿梭于亚空间基本结构的管道，通过其能够快速到达其他星门。
gateway_final.en_desc: A conduit through the very fabric of subspace that enables rapid travel to other Gateways.

gateway_ruined.zhcn_desc: 这个古老的遗迹似乎是星门之类的东西。若能修复的话，舰船就可以通过其快速前往其它功能正常的星门。
gateway_ruined.en_desc: The ancient remains of what appears to be a Gateway of some sort. If repaired, this structure could enable starships to rapidly travel to other functional Gateways.

matter_decompressor_0.megastructure_details: 这个§Y物质解压器§!将黑洞的引力聚焦于一处，形成了一个引力钻头，我们可以用这个钻头从黑洞的奇点中钻取物质，并转化为£minerals£矿物。

matter_decompressor_1.zhcn_desc: 使用先进的引力重定向引擎来将设施基地固定在黑洞的外围边缘上。
matter_decompressor_1.en_desc: An advanced gravity redirection engine holds the facility base on the edge of the black hole's event horizon.
matter_decompressor_1.on_build_complete_logic:
▲来自
№触发国家事件
№id：mega.9010
matter_decompressor_1.megastructure_details: 这个§Y物质解压器§!将黑洞的引力聚焦于一处，形成了一个引力钻头，我们可以用这个钻头从黑洞的奇点中钻取物质，并转化为£minerals£矿物。

matter_decompressor_2.zhcn_desc: 引力透镜设施可以将黑洞的部分引力重定向并集中到一个指定的小范围力场中。
matter_decompressor_2.en_desc: The gravity lensing facility redirects a portion of the black hole's gravitational force, concentrating it even more strongly in a selected area.
matter_decompressor_2.on_build_complete_logic:
▲来自
№触发国家事件
№id：mega.9011
matter_decompressor_2.megastructure_details: 这个§Y物质解压器§!将黑洞的引力聚焦于一处，形成了一个引力钻头，我们可以用这个钻头从黑洞的奇点中钻取物质，并转化为£minerals£矿物。

matter_decompressor_3.zhcn_desc: 通过改变引力作用方向的技术所生成出的扭曲引力力场，我们成功创建出了一种依靠操纵引力来钻孔的超级钻机。
matter_decompressor_3.en_desc: The ultimate refinement of the gravity redirection system forms a focused area of twisted gravity, creating a vast drill whose bore is made of redirected and concentrated gravitational force.
matter_decompressor_3.on_build_complete_logic:
▲来自
№触发国家事件
№id：mega.9012
matter_decompressor_3.megastructure_details: 这个§Y物质解压器§!将黑洞的引力聚焦于一处，形成了一个引力钻头，我们可以用这个钻头从黑洞的奇点中钻取物质，并转化为£minerals£矿物。

matter_decompressor_4.zhcn_desc: 将一道扭曲的重力深入奇点，配合轨道上的一系列自动物质解压器、处理器与熔炉，我们得以从黑洞中开采矿物。
matter_decompressor_4.en_desc: With a bore of twisted gravity tunneling into the singularity and a series of automated matter decompressors, processors, and smelters in orbit, we are able to extract minerals from a black hole.

matter_decompressor_ruined.zhcn_desc: 一座破损严重的轨道空间站，这座物质解压器曾经从该星系的黑洞中回收物质，几乎是游离在物理法则的边缘。
matter_decompressor_ruined.en_desc: An orbital station in sever disrepair, this Matter Decompressor once skirted natural law by reclaiming matter from the black hole in this system.
matter_decompressor_ruined.megastructure_details: 该复杂装置的残骸对黑洞有所干扰。

matter_decompressor_restored.zhcn_desc: 将一道扭曲的重力深入奇点，配合轨道上的一系列自动物质解压器、处理器与熔炉，我们得以从黑洞中开采矿物。
matter_decompressor_restored.en_desc: With a bore of twisted gravity tunneling into the singularity and a series of automated matter decompressors, processors, and smelters in orbit, we are able to extract minerals from a black hole.

strategic_coordination_center_0.megastructure_details: 可以将全国上下恒星基地网络进行同步化处理的设施，提升基地的防御及攻击能力。

strategic_coordination_center_1.zhcn_desc: 战略指挥中心的装甲船体保护着我们的军团最高指挥部，这里的人可以在设施中安全地策划与指挥军事行动。
strategic_coordination_center_1.en_desc: The armored hull of the Strategic Coordination Center houses the cream of our military command, who devote their time to strategy and planning in this state-of-the-art facility.

strategic_coordination_center_2.zhcn_desc: 为战略指挥中心添加了性能强劲的通讯阵列模块，让军事家们可以向宇宙各处的舰队发布无法被干扰及骇入的指令。
strategic_coordination_center_2.en_desc: Powerful communication arrays have been added to the Strategic Coordination Center, enabling our strategists to issue unjammable, unhackable orders to our ships throughout the galaxy.
